attributes.action: Require Channel 4 Television to launch their High Definition Television Service as Free to Air
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Channel 4 Television has announced that only viewers using the BSkyB platform will be able to receive their new HDTV service, later this year.
This goes against the principles of Public Service Broadcasting in this country and should not be allowed to happen. It should be unencrypted and Free to Air on the satellite

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
